biotools.summary:
Performance of Qure.ai automatic classifiers against a large annotated database of patients with diverse forms of tuberculosis.

Artificial Intelligence for Radiology.

Qure.ai develops deep learning algorithms that interpret radiology images. Our mission is to make healthcare accessible and affordable using the power of deep learning.

Qure.ai is now deploying AI-powered pandemic response solutions for COVID-19 management.

Artificial Intelligence algorithms for medical imaging.

Built with deep learning technology and trained using millions of images, our products identify and localize abnormalities on X-rays, MRI and CT scans.
